      • setRandTriangleAndPossibleHyperPlanes

        public void setRandTriangleAndPossibleHyperPlanes()
        Returns a vector of length 1 from the center of this triangle which is a normal of a dimentions-1 dimentional hyperplane containing this triangle. In general there is a choice of n-2 of these.
